lead_paragraph: The transfer bans imposed on Real Madrid and Atlético Madrid have been suspended until the appeals process is completed, according to FIFA, soccer’s world governing body.
snippet: The transfer bans imposed on Real Madrid and Atlético Madrid have been suspended until the appeals process is completed, according to FIFA, soccer’s world governing body.
abstract: FIFA says transfer bans imposed on Real Madrid and Atletico Madrid for rules violations will be suspended until appeals process is completed; other soccer news noted.
